guest.name: Gibson Biddle
guest.title: Former VP of Product
guest.background: Gibson Biddle is a renowned product leader who served as VP of Product at Netflix and Chegg. He now focuses on teaching product strategy, management, and leadership to PMs globally through workshops and writing.
guest.background_zh: Gibson Biddle 是一位享誉全球的产品领袖，曾任 Netflix 和 Chegg 的产品副总裁。目前他专注于通过工作坊和写作，向全球产品经理传授产品战略、管理及领导力经验。

episodeSummary: Gibson Biddle shares his legendary product strategy frameworks, using real-world case studies from Netflix's evolution. The conversation covers how to balance customer delight with business needs, frameworks for prioritization, and actionable advice for career growth as a product leader.
episodeSummary_zh: Gibson Biddle 分享了他著名的产品战略框架，并结合 Netflix 演变过程中的真实案例进行解析。本次对话涵盖了如何平衡用户愉悦感与商业需求、优先级排序的方法论，以及产品领袖职业成长的实战建议。
